title: Frank Mecum (Mecum auctions!)
description:
Frank Mecum is the consignment director for Mecum Auctions. He also works the floor as a seller’s representative, working to lock in sales during live auctions. We'll be talking all about the collector car market, auction stories good and bad, and everything else. 

About Mecum Auctions- https://www.mecum.com/about-us/

2020 Auction Schedule- https://www.mecum.com/collector-cars/auctions/

Check out the Mecum digital magazine: https://monthly.mecum.com/

Dana Mecum's 33rd Original Spring Classic- Featured Lots-  https://www.mecum.com/auctions/indianapolis-2020/lots/featured/

The John Atzbach Collection-  https://www.mecum.com/auctions/indianapolis-2020/collections/john-atzbach-collection/

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman

NEW SHIRTS! https://www.blipshift.com/tst

Watch the show on  YouTube: https://youtu.be/DtB0cBx-FTg
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
